--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "Repairs aren't exactly my function but I'll make do." Lunarpine 
said 
> as he took the supplies from Shadow Wing "Thank you, for 
everything."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::Shadow Wing::
> > 
> > She walked to the engine room and looked for some welding 
> supplies.  
> > She found a torch and a few peices of scrap metal.  She picked up 
> > what she could and took them outside to Lunarpine.  She smiled at 
> the 
> > thought of him.  She smiled at thinking about him at all.  
> > 
> > She walked outside while holding the stuff. "I found this 
inside.  
> > I'll help weld the plates on the sides if you want?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > Lunarpine walked around the outside of the Ark picking up 
broken 
> > off 
> > > pieces of the hull, they wouldn't hold for very long once 
> > reattatched 
> > > but they'd only have to hold until they crossed the ocean. 
> Ramulus 
> > > was out gathering technology, Ratchet was working on a way to 
> > > reassemble the ancient ship, and the others were gathering 
> > equipment 
> > > for the journey. Maybe this plan had a slim chance after all.
> > >
